title: Chrome
description: This extension automatically opens Chrome browser when you run Chrome.

title: Touch
description: This extension allows you to use touch on Windows.

title: battery
description: Check your laptop's battery status with ease using this user-friendly batch script. Get real-time updates on the current charge level and charging status, ensuring efficient power management for uninterrupted productivity.

title: IP Information
description: Get information about your computer's IP address

title: filecounter
description: Counts all the files in a specific directory that you can assign
